reviews.text: Hotel Dana is more than 30 years old and they still keep the original design & building.
reviews.title: Friendly atmosphere at the oldest hotel in Solo

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms and bathrooms are clean, but one thing that bothered me was the bed-sheet and towels are not so crispy white! in fact they are rather yellow in color dan have stains here and there. Breakfast was just ok, not too many choices and was just the standard Indonesian home-cooking (fried noodle, red-bean soup, fried tempe & tahu, sauteed vegetables, fruit).
reviews.title: Good staff & breakfast but a disappointing room - very smelly!
